title: Tabulation characters should not be used
summary: Developers should not need to configure the tab width of their text editors in order to be able to read source code. So the use of tabulation character must be forbidden.
root_cause: Mixed use of tabs and spaces for indentation
fix_steps:
1. Replace all tabs with spaces (typically 4 spaces per tab in Python)
2. Configure editor to show whitespace characters
3. Set up automated formatting tools like Black or autopep8
autofix_snippet:
# Use spaces instead of tabs
# Configure .editorconfig:
# [*.py]
# indent_style = space
# indent_size = 4
